text:
@FogCityMidge @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden If this is your campaign then prepare to lose.  Yes,  you strung together a number of misstatements.   Congratulations. 

They will string together a greater number of Trump failures: impeached,  obstruction,  coronavirus failure,  crashed economy, failed trade war....
